bibl.title: Cercidas’ Fr. 5: Addressee and Metre
bibl.seg: Juan Luis López Cruces, Cercidas' Fr. 5: Addressee and Metre.

Identifies Cercidas' addressee in fr. 5 as Pasicrates (P. Oxy. VIII, 1082 = P. lit. Lond. 59 [= MP3 237; LDAB 536], col. X, 11). Based on the assumption that this is a speaking name ('the Almighty'), a hypothesis is presented that is consistent with what can be read of the meliamb. In addition, a new colometry of the legible part of the poem is proposed.
